name: Sneak 'n Peek [A26]
description:
Sneak N' Peek - is a stealth game in which you have to infiltrate an unknown enemy base and gather important intel about the evil doings of "Meli Corp.".

The enemies and the environment are constantly adapting to your mistakes and actions. Are you the right spy for this job?

CREDITS-TEAM:

Gjemel Likaj : Programmer 

Cagatay Aydin: Game-Designer, Game Artist

TOOLS:

Game Engine: Unity 2020.3.20f1

Asset Production: Photoshop, Maya    

Programming: Visual Studio (C#)

Sounds: Audacity

CREDITS - UNIVERSITY OF APPLIED SCIENCES EUROPE:

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof.Florian Berger, Hendrik Demmer, Prof. Csongor Baranyai & Yasemin Weichsel
